reviews.review_msg: He is the BEST! I never ever seen any professor like him so far. He is so nice, so helpful, and explain so clear. You MUST take his class if you have chance. His exam is not so easy, but he will give you lots of chance to improve your grade. You will not be able to see any other Math prof like him through your life-time.
A very kind prof with exceptional teaching ability.  Always available for extra help, open to suggestions from students.  Was a pleasure to have taken a class with him.
Superb Prof. A truly giften teacher. Little hard on the tests though, but high homework and project marks compensate.
love this prof! he's probably one of the nicest teacher i've ever had.
He is a great professor. Learned a lot from him and hoping to take further courses with him in the future.

This guy is good indeed. It's refreshing to have a project instead of a final exam and his midterms are very fair. He's willing to help students and puts a lot (maybe too much) effort to impress his students in class. Overall a very good prof.
He is by far the best teacher that we have encountered in the department. He cares about students, and spends a lot of time in office hours, etc. Tough exams thoug...

She teaches the material with much clarity. I love how when presenting a new definition or theorem, she really goes through the intuition before getting to the rigorous bits. It makes it feel like I'm learning something cool, instead of being forced to memorize yet another formula. Also, one of the most organized profs I've had in a while.

the worst prof in math department I have met. The quality of course is terrible. She cannot teach the konwlege clearly. And her notes is confused. what is more, her test is extremely difficult. She give a problem in 50-min midterm which she did the problem using more than 50 min in class and have not solved it. She is even not clearly about wt s t
Assignments were hard. But he's very helpful. I worked hard and was a regular to his office hour. So I did good on assignments and I think exams were fair.
Good class. You need to work very hard though.

Professor Ruuth is an odd professor with a soft tone of voice which can make the material seem boring. He is disorganized but extremely approachable outside of class. He makes lots of mistakes which made me wonder if he truly knows the material. Overall good professor for boosting your grade.
